text: Microsoft Windows Odyssey is a a beta build that mixed with Windows Codename "Neptune" to form Windows Whistler, later called XP. There are no screenshots of Windows Odyssey. Build number is also unknown. There is no ISO of Windows Odyssey available due to it merging with Codename: Neptune before the creation of the ISO. == History == Development of Windows Odyssey started in the year 1999 or 2000. Microsoft merged Windows Odyssey and Neptune, leading to the creation of Whistler. The ISO is nowhere to be found, as it merged with Neptune before a ISO was made. Category:Microsoft operating systems
title: Windows Odyssey
